social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced.description: Beginning of tooltip shown over a replaced social button, e.g [Privacy Badger has replaced this ]Facebook[ button].

options_remove_origin_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove this origin from Privacy Badger?

non_tracker_tip.message: Currently Privacy Badger only checks if third parties are using cookies, HTML5 local storage, or canvas fingerprinting to track your browsing. Some of these domains may be using tracking methods that Privacy Badger can't detect.

intro_hungry.message: Nothing can stop the Privacy Badger from eating cookies when it's hungry!

options_dnt_policy_setting.message: Check if sites comply with EFF's Do Not Track policy

invalid_domain.message: Please add a valid domain or URL.

intro2.message: This extension is designed to automatically protect your privacy from third party trackers that load invisibly when you browse the web. We send the Do Not Track header with each request, and our extension     evaluates the likelihood that you are still being tracked. If the algorithm deems the likelihood is too high, we automatically block your request from being sent to the domain. Please understand that Privacy Badger is in beta, and the algorithm's determination is not conclusive that the domain is tracking you.

report_success.message: Thanks! We'll get to the bottom of it.

dnt_tooltip.message: This domain promises to not track you

extension_error_text.message: Please tell us about the following error:
extension_error_text.description: Shown in the popup when there is a problem with the user's Privacy Badger extension that we want to encourage the user to tell us about.

data_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

slideshow_13.message: If I am breaking a page, please let my developers know so that they can fix the problem! You can do so by clicking this button.

whitelist_form_domain_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the Add domain input under the Whitelisted Domains tab on the options page.

slideshow_4.message: If you click on my icon you can see the list of potential trackers on the current tab.

slideshow_5.message: If the slider is red, it means I have blocked that tracker entirely!  That fiend won't bother you any more.

domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.message: Click here to block this domain from setting cookies
domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the center part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

popup_instructions.message: potential trackers on this page. These sliders let you control how Privacy Badger handles each one. You shouldn't need to adjust the sliders unless something is broken.
popup_instructions.description: Continuation of the popup message that shows number of trackers

options_domain_filter_block.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_webrtc_setting.message: Prevent WebRTC from leaking local IP address *

popup_instructions_no_trackers.message: No trackers detected. Hooray for privacy!
popup_instructions_no_trackers.description: Text shown in the popup when there are no trackers on the page.

options_domain_list_tab.description: This is an options page tab heading.

intro1.message: Privacy Badger blocks spying ads and invisible trackers.  It's there to ensure that companies can't track your browsing without your consent.

share_button_title_twitter.description: Tooltips that come up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the introductory slideshow page.

first_run_text.message: Learn how Privacy Badger protects your privacy.

feed_the_badger_title.message: click to return control of this tracker to Privacy Badger

intro_has_blocked.message: means Privacy Badger believes this domain is a tracker, and has blocked it.

options_domain_search.description: Label for a text input box on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

what_is_a_tracker.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the 'tracking domains' link under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

slideshow_1.message: Hi, I'm Privacy Badger! Thanks for installing me. I'm here to give you some helpful tips, so we can work together.

options_pb_has_detected.description: Beginning of message on the Tracking Domains options page tab that shows the total number of trackers detected so far.

social_tooltip_button.description: Continuation of tooltip shown over a replaced social button, e.g [Privacy Badger has replaced this ]Facebook[ button].

slideshow_11.message: If you change a setting I've made, you can always put it back under my control by clicking the undo arrow.

report_terms.message: This will automatically send the following information to EFF: the site you're currently visiting, your browser version, the version of Privacy Badger, and the state of all of the sliders for this site.

whitelisted_domains.description: This is an options page tab heading.

popup_enable_for_site.message: Enable Privacy Badger for This Site

options_domain_type_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

import_successful.message: Tracker list and settings updated successfully!

intro_text.message: You're now protected by Privacy Badger. To learn how Privacy Badger works, click below for a quick tutorial.

options_webrtc_warning.message: * WebRTC can leak your local IP address. Privacy Badger's default setting helps protect you, but for added protection you may enable this option. Note that doing so may degrade performance on some tools like Google Hangouts.

options_general_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

slideshow_7.message: If the slider is green that means that I can't tell if this domain is tracking you yet. It might not be, but I will still keep an eye on it.

domain_slider_block_tooltip.message: Click here to block this domain entirely
domain_slider_block_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the leftmost part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

options_domain_filter_cookieblock.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

show_tracking_domains_acknowledgement.message: I understand; please show me the tracking domains list anyway
show_tracking_domains_acknowledgement.description: Acknowledgement shown next to the checkbox required to reveal the tracking domains list on the options page.

firstRun_title.message: Thank you for installing Privacy Badger!

import_select_file.message: Please select a file to import.

popup_blocked.message: There are no third party resources on this site.

report_broken_site.message: Did Privacy Badger break this site? Let us know!

tooltip_cookieblock.message: Center the slider to block cookies

slideshow_12.message: If you are having trouble with a page and you think it's my fault, you can click the disable button here. I'll go to sleep and not block anything on that website.

slideshow_3.message: If I discover something that behaves like a tracker, I will put a stop to it by blocking it.

slideshow_9.message: I learn as I go, so the longer you use me the better I will get at protecting you from sneaky trackers!

slideshow_2.message: I will sit up here in your browser and watch for spying ads and trackers that are recording what you're doing online.

slideshow_8.message: The first time you click my icon you might see that all the trackers are green—don't worry! I'm different from other tracker blocking software—instead of knowing a list of things to block right away, I learn what to block as you browse. If I'm not blocking anything yet, try browsing around to 4 or 5 different websites. I should start blocking common trackers after that.

options_domain_filter_dnt.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

popup_help_button.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the question mark button in the upper right corner of the popup.

options_domain_filter_allow.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

share_button_title_google.description: Tooltips that come up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the introductory slideshow page.

show_tracking_domains_message.message: You shouldn't need to modify anything here.
show_tracking_domains_message.description: Shown above the acknowledgement checkbox required to reveal the tracking domains list on the options page. This is the second paragraph; the first paragraph is the message under the "slideshow_8" key.

options_domain_filter_all.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

tooltip_block.message: Move the slider left to block a domain

options_domain_filter_user.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Privacy Badger is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the Privacy Badger icon in the browser toolbar, or by typing the domain in the box below and clicking the "Add domain" button.

pb_detected.description: Beginning of popup message that shows the number of trackers.

intro_by_eff.message: A project of the Electronic Frontier Foundation

options_domain_list_one_tracker.message: Privacy Badger has detected one potential tracking domain so far. The slider lets you control how Privacy Badger handles it.
options_domain_list_one_tracker.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains options page tab when Privacy Badger learned of exactly one tracker so far.

tooltip_allow.message: Move the slider right to allow a domain

popup_disable_for_site.message: Disable Privacy Badger for This Site

intro_social_share.message: Let the world know that you are taking a stand against online tracking

popup_instructions_one_tracker.message: Privacy Badger detected a potential tracker on this page. The slider lets you control how Privacy Badger handles it. You shouldn't need to adjust the slider unless something is broken.
popup_instructions_one_tracker.description: Text shown in the popup when there is exactly one tracker on the page.

domain_slider_allow_tooltip.message: Click here to allow this domain
domain_slider_allow_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the rightmost part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

options_domain_list_trackers.message: potential tracking domains so far. These sliders let you control how Privacy Badger handles each tracker.
options_domain_list_trackers.description: Continuation of message on the Tracking Domains options page tab that shows the total number of trackers detected so far.

intro_cookie_blocked.message: means the domain is believed to be both a tracker and necessary for the functioning of the page, so Privacy Badger is allowing it but blocking its cookies.

options_domain_status_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

remove_button.description: This is the label for the 'Remove selected' buttons.

intro_no_tracker.message: means that Privacy Badger believes this is not tracker. You can click on the Privacy Badger icon in your browser's toolbar if you wish to override the automatic blocking settings. Or, you can browse in peace as Privacy Badger starts finding and eating up web trackers one by one.

options_domain_list_no_trackers.message: Privacy Badger hasn't detected any tracking domains yet. Keep browsing!
options_domain_list_no_trackers.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains tab on the options page for new and recent installations.

slideshow_15.message: Of course you can also just leave all these settings alone, and I will continue to silently eat up all the trackers that I detect.

non_tracker.message: The domains below don't appear to be tracking you

slideshow_14.message: If you want to change other settings, you can click this gear icon.

slideshow_6.message: If the slider is yellow, that means that I have partially blocked that tracker. I will do my best to prevent it from tracking you by eating its cookies, but blocking it entirely might break the page.

slideshow_16.message: Thanks for taking an important, easy step toward protecting your privacy! You can click here if you need help again, and you can click below to let the world know you take a stand against online tracking.

share_button_title_facebook.description: Tooltips that come up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the introductory slideshow page.

description.message: Privacy Badger protects you from trackers as you surf the web!

slideshow_10.message: If you think that I've made the wrong decision for a tracker, you can move the slider to red to block it, yellow to partly block it, and green to allow it.
